title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
01:13 <sburjan`> has quit  
01:13 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
01:22 <lucaa> has quit  
01:25 <+sburjan`> cjdelisle: around ?  
01:26 <@cjdelisle> yea  
01:26 <+sburjan`> Sergiu committed some tests on ui-tests today  
01:26 <@cjdelisle> odd how I click on the irc tab exactly when you msg  
01:26 <+sburjan`> but I can't see ithat they ran on jenkins  
01:26 <+sburjan`> telepath :)  
01:27 <+sburjan`> it's either me reading wrong the data, or last ui-tests ran was 3 days ago  
01:27 <@cjdelisle> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/d3d32de1112bdf313232dff7e03e3308ec1896da that?  
01:27 <+sburjan`> yes  
01:27 <+sburjan`> how come that commit didnt trigger jenkins to run  
01:27 <@cjdelisle> looking...  
01:30 <@cjdelisle> hmm it might be the way they are merged  
01:31 <+sburjan`> so last time ui-test were ran is 3 days ago ?  
01:31 <@cjdelisle> yes.  
01:31 <+sburjan`> well we have a problem then  
01:31 <+sburjan`> ci isn't working properly  
01:32 <@cjdelisle> it's not because of merging because sdumitriu committed something yesterday...  
01:32 <+sburjan`> odd nobody noticed it in 3 days  
01:40 <abusenius> has quit  
01:56 <@cjdelisle> http://issues.hudson-ci.org/browse/HUDSON-5677  
02:06 <@cjdelisle> also https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-5677  
02:13 <+sburjan`> wow, hardcore blocker  
02:15 <+sburjan`> now how the hell both of them have the same issue number ?  
02:15 <+sburjan`> they forked the jira too ? :))  
02:16 <@cjdelisle> hmm more likely this  
02:16 <@cjdelisle> https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-5413  
02:17 <@cjdelisle> http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-manager/scmPollLog/?  
02:17 <@cjdelisle> that one is hanging  
02:19 <@cjdelisle> quick way to get things running it hit reboot on hudson  
05:07 <DrLou> has quit

14:55 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:55 <abusenius> has quit  
14:56 <sburjan`> has quit  
15:52 <DrLou> has quit  
16:01 <cjdelisle> has quit  
16:02 <jbrBridge> has quit  
16:02 <cjdelisle> has joined #xwiki  
16:03 <jbrBridge> has joined #xwiki  
16:04 <lpereira> has quit  
17:02 <minimike> has joined #xwiki  
17:04 <minimike> hi there  
17:06 <minimike> I've heard Xwiki could be deployed as an JSR 286 Portlet. I've never used Xwiki but this could be very interesting for me. Where I could get code, dokumentation ans some samples for building a Portlet?  
17:13 <Chami> has joined #xwiki  
17:33 <abusenius\_> has quit  
18:27 <@cjdelisle> what do we usually do about hung scm poling threads on hudson?  
18:41 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
19:23 <Chami> sdumitriu: hi  
19:24 <@sdumitriu> Hi Chami  
19:25 <Chami> sdumitriu: you published this issue http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-5970 ?  
19:28 <@sdumitriu> Yep  
19:28 <@sdumitriu> How's it going?  
19:28 <@sdumitriu> Any progress with it?  
19:28 <Chami> sorry.. but no progress  
19:28 <Chami> since I'm new.. I can't find a where to begin  
19:28 <@sdumitriu> OK, were you able to reproduce it yet?  
19:28 <Chami> no :(  
19:28 <Chami> can you give me some instructions?  
19:28 <@sdumitriu> Sure  
19:28 <@sdumitriu> Hold on a minute  
19:28 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
19:32 <@sdumitriu> So, to reproduce it you need to:  
19:32 <@sdumitriu> 1. Create a new page called "C++ is great"  
19:32 <@sdumitriu> 2. Press Ctrl+G (or click on the "Jump to any page in the wiki" text in the panel on the right)  
19:32 <@sdumitriu> 3. Type C++ and see that no results are found  
19:33 <@sdumitriu> 4. Type is+great and see that the page you just created is found  
19:33 <@sdumitriu> Hm, Jira seems to be stuck again  
19:34 <Chami> sdumitriu: yeah.. page doesn't load  
19:37 <@sdumitriu> Let me know when you reproduced the problem  
19:41 <@cjdelisle> We have a hung scm polling thread on hudson and it hasn't built anything since the third.  
19:42 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
19:48 <Chami> sdumitriu: I made a blog post and searched it  
19:48 <Chami> sdumitriu:  and I found that page  
19:49 <@sdumitriu> How did you search it?  
19:49 <@sdumitriu> See step 2  
19:53 <Chami> sdumitriu: i mean what you told is exactly right  
19:54 <Chami> normal search works fine but "Jump to any page in the wiki" doesn't show  
19:54 <@sdumitriu> Right  
19:55 <@sdumitriu> Next, you'll have to analyze the problem and see what request is being made, and where is it processed  
19:55 <@sdumitriu> Do you have firebug installed?  
19:55 <Chami> no  
19:55 <@sdumitriu> Install it  
19:55 <@sdumitriu> getfirebug.com  
19:56 <Chami> sdumitriu: ok, i'm on it  
20:01 <Chami> sdumitriu: done  
20:08 <Chami> sdumitriu: I will look where it process using firebug  
20:08 <Chami> sdumitriu: thank you for your help  
20:09 <@sdumitriu> Open Firebug, go to the Net tab, and look at the request being fired as you type in the jump to page input  
20:10 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
20:13 <Chami> sdumitriu:  
20:13 <Chami> sdumitriu:  found it  
20:16 <Chami> sdumitriu: letter '+' is replaced with %2B and white space is replaced with %20 in get request  
20:17 <@sdumitriu> Yes, that's normal  
20:19 <Chami> sdumitriu: but in both situations it replies the same json object  
20:20 <Chami> and this would be the issue  
20:23 <lucaa> has quit  
20:28 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
20:29 <Chami> sdumitriu: can you tell me from where this response generate?  
20:29 <Chami> sdumitriu: is there a way to find it from firebug  
20:32 <sdumitriu> has quit  
21:17 <Chami> has quit  
21:49 <DrLou> has quit  
22:38 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
22:59 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
22:59 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki  
22:59 <abusenius\_> is now known as <abusenius>
